def has_faucet(sink: item):
    # Determine whether this sink has a faucet
    symbol has_faucet=exists faucet: item: is_faucet(faucet) and close(faucet, sink)
    return has_faucet

def has_soap_near_sink(sink: item):
    # Determine whether there is soap near the sink
    symbol has_soap=exists soap: item: is_soap(soap) and close(soap, sink)
    return has_soap

behavior fill_sink_with_soapy_water(sink: item):
    body:
        achieve closed(sink)
        # Ensure the sink is closed
        
        if has_faucet(sink):
            bind faucet: item where:
                is_faucet(faucet) and close(faucet, sink)
            achieve_once is_on(faucet)
            # If the sink has a faucet, turn it on to fill with water

        if has_soap_near_sink(sink):
            bind soap: item where:
                is_soap(soap) and close(soap, sink)
            achieve_once inhand(soap)
            # If there is soap near the sink, grab it temporarily
            scrub(sink)
            # Use the soap to make the water soapy
        
        achieve has_water(sink)
        # Ensure the sink now contains water

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind sink: item where:
            is_sink(sink) and inside_char(char, sink)
        # Select the sink in the bathroom

        fill_sink_with_soapy_water(sink)
        # Fill the sink with soapy water
